website_summaries.verdict: The Dash Rapid Egg Cooker is worth a look if you’d like to prepare breakfast eggs with hardly any effort or without making much of a mess, but for best results you’ll still have to use a separate timer.
pros: The Dash Rapid Egg Cooker offers an affordable way to poach, boil and steam eggs without much effort
It’s easy to use, clean and doesn’t make a mess
cons: It’s calibrated to cook large eggs, so preparing extra-large and jumbo eggs properly takes practice
Eggs take longer to cook than on a traditional stovetop
Its alarm buzzer is loud, unpleasant and not very accurate

customer_reviews.title: This banshee cooks eggs perfectly! Pros: Perfect eggs. Cons: The blood-curling shriek of death that alerts you your eggs are fin
customer_reviews.text: This definitely cooks eggs to absolute perfection. And it doesn't take long at all! I've never been able to master the medium boiled egg, and with this, I'll never have to learn! Love this device! The ONLY problem is the "alert" that the eggs are done sounds like an all out nuclear-air strike alarm, or at the very least, my fire alarm. I nearly shat my pants each time my eggs are done. I'll likely keep it because the eggs are so perfect, but just be aware of the banshee that gets released each time eggs are fully cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Heck to the No
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely the most trifling thing I've ever purchased. I bought it because I have a turtle who eats boiled eggs kind of in bulk. I decided to test drive it on myself and make some poached eggs. ---Oh my Lord Baby Jesus.--- There has never been anything so repulsive created within the four walls of my kitchen. I followed the directions to a capital T, but the "poached" eggs this thing produced were mostly clear, watery, and straight up insulting. They went right from the device to the garbage disposal. I wouldn't eat those eggs with YOUR mouth. DEE-SCUST-ING. Never again. Not even for the turtle.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: A complete failure
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand all the positive reviews, my experience could not be more opposite. I followed the cooking instructions to the letter, and I was left with soggy uncooked egg underneath a layer of cooked egg. I tried several times, and all results were the same. A complete failure. And the buzzer/alarm is every bit as obnoxiously loud that has been described in most reviews both positive & negative.
customer_reviews.author: KeithDavid

customer_reviews.title: Poached eggs: don't even bother with this thing.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. If you're looking for fool-proof poached eggs, avoid this worthless little gizmo. I wasted countless breakfasts and a dozen eggs trying to get perfectly poached eggs. First use, I followed the instructions and ended up with soggy, watery, undercooked, inedible eggs. Next time, I added more water (extra cooking time). Same outcome. I tried using a silicone cup. Inedible. I'm returning it because I'm starving and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: grant m walters

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have a different brand egg cooker in my winter residence (also purchased through Amazon) which works perfectly! But, while it automatically turns off, there isn't an alarm that alerts you when it is done. So based on the reviews, an it's recommended status, I decided to buy this Dash egg cooker. What a mistake! The first cooker came with a cracked top. The replacement is not damaged but it doesn't work well at all. I never know what "type" of egg I am going to get....hard boiled, soft, runny yolk, inedible???? What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marty W

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product thinking it would perfect for my morning schedule
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product thinking it would perfect for my morning schedule. I never really got hard boiled eggs, but soft boiled was okay. The more I used it, the softer my yolks were. The last time I used it I bit into my egg and yolk squirted everywhere. I returned the product for a refund. Not a good experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: WJI

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!  CAN ONLY POACH 2 EGGS AT A TIME - PRODUCT INFO MISLEADING!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving this so I could prepare up to 6 poached eggs at a time. Upon receipt, I found out the poaching tray only accommodates TWO (2) eggs at a time, not SIX (6). The Product Description clearly says: "6 Egg Capacity Electric Egg Cooker for Hard Boiled Eggs, Poached Eggs, Scrambled Egg" This is absolutely not true, and I lost several days waiting for the cooker to arrive only to find this out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The buzzer could wake the dead but makes perfect eggs
customer_reviews.text: Eggs cook perfectly and are easy to peel. No clue why they had to use a tornado siren for the buzzer. It will wake the entire house.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It was good for about six weeks
customer_reviews.text: It was good for about six weeks. In the beginning the alarm was REALLY REALLY LOUD. The sound gets softer with each use. By week six, no alarm. Now I have to stand next to the cooker and watch the the eggs cook.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Does not cook, leaves a soupy mess
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why everybody is saying it works great. The poached eggs came out with yellow watery substance running from under it like it was pregnant and it's water broke. When I attempted an omelet, the top of it cooked OK but the middle (inside) and the bottom where soupy and grossly runny. I tried the poached eggs 1st and assumed for an omelet with ham, olives and cheese in it, it would take a lot longer so I put even more water than it called for to make it cook longer and it was still disgusting ans watery! Returning tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: K.V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Eggs. Every. Darn. Time.
customer_reviews.text: If you eat hard boiled eggs often this is absolutely 100% worth the money just for that. Eggs come out perfect every time. No green rings. No rubbery whites. Easy to peel every time. It's easy, faster than boiling water, and every egg turns out the same. Makes other kinds of eggs too, and according to the booklet you can steam veggies and other things in it too. But omg even if you only ever used it for hard boiled eggs it's worth it. I don't think I've ever given a product 5 stars like this before. Also, skeptics: yes, I know boiling eggs isn't hard. It's the consistent results with even less effort thats remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Crockery

customer_reviews.title: Will not stop buzzing when cooking eggs
customer_reviews.text: I initially was really excited about this product but am very much disappointed. I carefully read the instructions, and every time I cook eggs it makes an incessant buzzing noise that will not stop. After the first use the bottom half of the product was coated with very difficult to clean white egg residue. It's hard to clean, extremely noisy and does not even cook the eggs correctly. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Isa Crisostomo

customer_reviews.title: Leaves eggs runny, yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it at all. I'm terrible at making hard boiled eggs and thought this would help but it doesn't. The eggs weren't cooked all the way. I tried to poach the eggs and that didn't go well either. Too runny. I waited too long and can't return it or I it would definitely go back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works but......
customer_reviews.text: For hard boiled eggs, you need to add more water than instructions call for as other reviewers have mentioned. A buzzer will go off and stop the cooking if there is not enough water. That being said, if you add too much water, it boils over and leaks onto the counter. It's a fine balance. I've used it for a month and the plate is burned and hard to clean (even following recommended cleaning instructions). I will use it until it breaks, but will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as directions claim if less than capacity.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough if you calibrate cook time by adjusting the water amount manually (more for longer). Or maybe if you always cook with 6 eggs. Otherwise the water measuring cup is just a minimum, and the directions don't mention this possibility that I've found (a Q/A on here mentioned the idea of more water for fewer eggs). And eggs get on to surface I assume you shouldn't submerge so cleaning is a bit more delicate than I'd like (have to hope wiping with a rag is enough). Egg holder for boiled grabs any leakage from a cracked egg (after piercing) a bit more than I'd hoped too.
customer_reviews.author: EternalStudent

customer_reviews.title: eggs are cooked to perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because we were in the middle of a kitchen remodel and although I had thought I had covered all my bases as far as cooking, I soon realized that the only thing I was unable to cook without a stove were EGGS! Needless to say, I will never go back to cooking eggs the old fashioned way. This item does everything it says and cooks eggs perfectly. My husband said not only does the eggs taste better but they look great too. I have already recommended the cooker to others but 2 of my friends have already purchased it and they love it too!! Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Perform as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other 1 star reviews as I had the same experience with this machine. Poached eggs and omelettes were cooked exactly as directed and came out extremely runny. Only the very top 1/8" was solid...everything under that was like a raw egg! It did cook 2 hard boiled eggs OK but it took in excess of 12 minutes. We can boil them in water to hard boiled status from cold water to boiling water in 8 minutes! I do admit it was easy to clean and operated silently but the buzzer never did work. I obviously returned it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dall

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love eggs. This egg cooker is the best. I mostly use it for hard boiled eggs. Whenever I made them in a pan with water either the shell would stick to the egg, the yolk didn't cook all the way through...etc. This egg cooker is so easy to use and the eggs come out perfect. Best appliance purchase I have made this year. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more difficult to peel boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: Latest studies recommend one egg each day to increase good cholesterol so boiled eggs have become a part of my breakfast routine. Before discovering the Dash I struggled with difficult to peel boiled eggs. I tried everything from vinegar to salt added to the water and even ice baths but still got hard to peel eggs. I had reservations about the Dash until giving a try and now I get perfectly boiled eggs ( actually they are steamed ) every time. The alarm that another reviewer complained about is pleasant to my ears and almost music like. I couldn't be more satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Poultrygeist

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but chime is very annoying
customer_reviews.text: The product works well enough. The little container for measuring water is a translucent plastic with embossed measurements, which makes it really hard to read if you have weak eyesight or dim lighting. My biggest complaint is the chime when it is done cooking. Think "ice cream truck", but more annoying. While not loud per se, there's certainly no way to surprise someone with breakfast, the sound carries throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: By far the best gadget I have ever bought for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I rarely buy these types of gadgets because they end up sitting in my garage or basement after 1-2 uses. Not this gadget! We use it every single day. It is super easy. My kids use it to make themselves breakfast daily. We mostly use it to hard boil eggs. What I like best is that the shells literally slide off the egg. They are so easy to peel and are ready in minutes. I love this egg gadget. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Pearlman

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to, but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd similar product and my least favorite of the three. First, let me say that yes, it gets the job done. I use it almost exclusively for making hard boiled eggs. And it accomplishes that purpose. However, I have had more trouble peeling the eggs cooked with this Dash cooker than the other two (Cuisinart and Krups). And the consistency of the cooked eggs seems different - not as good, but perfectly acceptable. I bought this one to take on vacation, so it's a good choice for that purpose at an inexpensive price. I have not tried making poached eggs or omelettes with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Currie

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this little egg cooker. When you open it you can tell it was designed with ease of use in mind. The price is excellent. Boiling eggs on the stove is such a messy chore. I put a few drops of oil in the water to keep it from boiling over if an egg cracks. It leaves an oily film on the pot. This is easier, faster and cleaner. No cracked eggs! And the eggs come out the way they are supposed to. Just be careful not to get your fingers near the steam spout, which they warn against anyhow. Best to keep it out of reach of children. It's not a kid's toy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonnymouse

customer_reviews.title: BEST KITCHEN GADGET EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This cooker makes no noise except a nice ding, ding, ding when finished. It cooks new, old, in-between, just out of the fridge, at room temperature, any temperature PERFECTLY! EVERY TIME! Buy one, you will not regret it. I got the red and I love it on my granite counter. The eggs, after cooling them off, practically peel themselves. EVERYTIME! I am always asked to do deviled eggs to bring a dish event and dreaded making them. Not anymore. Just don't forget to prick the egg. This gadget is worth every penny and would make a great gift for people that like to cook. I love my egg cooker.
customer_reviews.author: SGA

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead! For less than $20 it’s totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We have about 25 of our own backyard hens and boiled farm fresh eggs are notoriously difficult to peel. This gadget made easy work of it and cooked them to perfection. If you like your yolk a little more done than mine, just experiment with the water level. The little cup that is included gives you an idea of expected doneness but the size of the egg affects things too I’m sure. We eat a lot of eggs in our house. I have two every morning for breakfast, the kids book them for their school lunches, they’re great on salads or for just a grab and go snack. Get this! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: The Nealy Family

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: This egg cooker works amazing! You can make poached, hard boiled, medium, and soft eggs, as well as an omelette. It can not make scrambled eggs although the listing says so. The heating element does turn brown from hard minerals in your water, but the packaging says you may scrub it with a "magic eraser" type cleaner to remove the stains. I've tried this and it does work. Other reviews say that the timer noise is awful, but ours plays a MUSICAL JINGLE when done which must be an update to the product. Overall in love
customer_reviews.author: Snickers Supply

customer_reviews.title: This is good stocking stuffer for EGG LOVERS
customer_reviews.text: Okay.... the skinny on this product. First I had never heard of this item before. My boss raved about it and because I love eggs I purchased it. I LOVE THIS LOUD RUN FOR THE HILL MACHINE! My eggs have come out perfect each and every time. I have read the reviews and my opinion is the nay-sayers you must be skipping a step for this not to work. And you must clean this machine after every use otherwise I can see that causing this little beauty to malfunction. If you like your eggs HARD this isn't the machine for you, it is truly for those who enjoy SOFT eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun C

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect inadequate cooking times
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would remove all of the ambiguity re how long to cook an egg for (hard boiled egg). This seemed to be it - THE FIRST TIME. Since then (and I have used it only about 6x in the last 2 months) the cooking time has been inconsistent -most of the time the eggs are undercooked, once very overcooked and I follow the directions to a "T" WOULD NOT SUGGEST YOU WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Zoedak

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I only use this machine for hard boiled eggs, but it is the dummy proof way to make hard boiled eggs!! You cannot go wrong. I have always hated making hard boiled eggs, I never knew when to take them out and put them in cold water. This eliminates all my problems, and I get perfect hard boiled eggs. Mineral deposits start to form on the metal part that heats up, but it is easily wiped off.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little egg maker!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth all five stars! Easy to use, eggs come out perfect EVERY TIME, and for some reason, they peel easier than they ever did when I boiled in a pot! Also worth noting: previous reviews mention an apocalyptic banshee scream when the timer goes off, but mine plays a cute little tune. I bought the 6 egg maker, but honestly I love this thing so much that Ill probably give it to a friend and buy myself the 12 egg size.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, but quit working-Please see my update
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Initially I used to puncture the bottom of the eggs according to the instructions came that with the egg cooker. but that made a mess, because the egg white started leaking out. Now I don't puncture the bottom of the eggs anymore, but it works fine. I wish if the buzzer had an auto stop after a few seconds. I used it to cook soft boiled or hard boiled. Never tried the medium or other settings. Update: Mine quit working . It tripped the GFCI . Tried to reset the GFCI, but it tripped with a popping noise from the egg cooker. I had to disconnect the egg cooker and reset the GFCI.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Makes hard-boiled eggs so EASY :-)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this device. I have to admit to only making hard-boiled eggs with it -- but just on that feature alone, this machine is worth it. The eggs come out perfect every time, and there's no messing with setting a timer, or checking the eggs as they boil on the stove, or dumping a pot of water out afterward. The only thing is that the eggs-done alarm is so bloody loud! LOL It could be half the volume and still accomplish its purpose. I guess the flip side is, I can be anywhere in the house and know that the eggs are ready! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Dabbler

customer_reviews.title: You have to poke holes!
customer_reviews.text: My breakfast staple is hard boiled eggs so I did a search on amazon and this one was recommended and highly rated. And I'm sure many like it but I'm not thrilled. You have to poke a tiny hole in the bottom of the egg to hard boil. I have broken more than a few trying to accomplish this. To me it defies logic to poke a hole into something so fragile to begin with. And it makes mediocre hard boiled eggs at best so....not so thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Some annoying things about it
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent appliance. Does really well with boiled eggs. I was disappointed with it’s poaching abilities. Tried adjusting the water quantity to control how runny the egg was but it always came out too runny. The poached egg container is too narrow which might possibly cause this. Finally, it has a really loud whistle when the eggs are done . I am not sure why they couldn’t come up with a more graceful sound rather than a loud whistle that scares kids and sounds more like an alarm. I am sure there are better egg cookers out there. I wouldn’t buy it if I could redo my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I really like this cooker. I want to give it 5 stars but they really need to use metal for the egg poaching tray. In order to get the whites cooked well enough, the yolks end up solid too. The plastic doesn’t allow the white part in contact to cook that great. Of course, maybe I’m wrong and poached ends have a slightly runny white part. Hard boiling eggs was a breeze. Haven’t used the omelet part. The water measuring is pretty close to cooking the eggs right on. I usually add a little bit more so the auto shut off cooks them a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Christian is Eggstatic!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the sixth egg cooker that I have purchased. It is phenomenally easy to get the perfect egg. 8 yr old Christian is eggstatic with his new tool that allows him to make his own breakfast. He loves eggs! No danger of a boiling pan of hot water spilling and causing injury. Perf & lload the eggs...add water to your liking...push the button. 12 minutes later he enjoys his favorite treat. Depending on the hardness of your water, using lime away or CLR quickly resolved mineral deposits for a shiny new appearance. Folks, you can’t go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: radrevdwh

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute and practical little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Cook eggs efficiently and perfectly. I've used it three times for soft boiled and hard boiled eggs and so far happy with it except for some reason, the metal base inside looks burnt. The noise it makes when the egg is ready is not as high pitched as I expected after reading some of the previous reviews. It sounds just like a timer going off, which is acceptable. The product comes with a needle to pierce the egg before cooking. Just wondering if that would break and if it does break one day, how am I supposed to pierce the eggs...? Overall, I would recommend this for the price and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: jjhuang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boiled eggs!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for anyone who loves making egg salad, deviled eggs or just plan hard boiled eggs. After cooking the eggs as required and then chilled in a bowl with ice and cold water, the shell is completely separated from the cooked egg by tapping it to crack the shell and then with a little pressure squeezing the shell can be removed to a perfect hard boiled egg inside! Just a note: I rated the noise level to 5 star meaning that the cooker is quiet when boiling the egg, then makes a musical sound that the eggs are cooked so that you will turn it off!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reed-Mercantini

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully designed, convenient little appliance
customer_reviews.text: My wife is converting a cargo van into an RV and I bought this for her "RV," As soon as she knew that her power source in the van could handle it, I immediately ordered anther one for the house. I was impressed with the thought that went into the design of the simple water measuring cup. I have lost my upper range hearing, so the "eggs ready" signal didn't startle me. In fact it actually sound musical to me. My wife, who has very acute hearing, said the the signal was a little startling, but that it sounded like a video game sound effect. We find the item to be extremely convenient and expect to use it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Paul-in-Davis-CA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cook hard boiled unless you double the time.
customer_reviews.text: Cooker is easy to use. Egg has to be pierced which can be difficult to do. Once hole is done and egg placed in cooker unit does cook them. I find unit does not cook them fully following their measurements. I have to cook the eggs twice as long by refilling the unit if you want hard boiled eggs. My wife likes cooking the eggs on the stove instead. I wanted to try this gadget as I thought it would quickly cook an egg. But cooking an egg in the pot is probably better. I would not bug this gadget again but it didn’t cost much so was worth the fun of trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Albright

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my egg cooker! It is very convenient. It cooks eggs nicely. The high quality steel heating plate has to be cleaned with vinegar after each use from our hard water, as it works by boiling off all the water. The dish for cooking egg dishes isn't big enough for a fritta with two eggs and much stuff. Also, if you put the veggies on the bottom the way the instructions tell you, the water cooks out of the veggies and gets trapped, and then your dish comes out soup, so I went back to making frittatas in the frying pan in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Dora A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A rapid egg cooker for a dolls house that really works in real life!
customer_reviews.text: Hard boiling eggs is a cinch!...but the eggs have to be turned bottoms up (the least rounded end) so that the cooker works properly. The water-measuring flask has markings that are not easy to read...but no problem; just re-mark it with a black marker. Haven't tried the poaching and omelet trays yet....they seem very small, probably just right for a doll's house. All in all, a great idea, but the device seems very fragile...very worth the price...time will tell how long it lasts! BTW, the alarm is VERY loud, so I know I can walk into another part of the house and still hear it when it goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Cover

customer_reviews.title: Best little egg cooker ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best little egg cooker ever!! So easy to use and cooks the eggs within 15 mins. Just add the water, punch hole in top of each egg with provider poker tool, replace lid, press button and voila perfect hard boiled eggs! They have updated the timer noise, many ppl commented on its "banshee scream" letting you know it was done, it now has a nice chiming noise. Something like a wind chime doorbell sound. I don't find it obnoxious at all. It's really easy to clean, I just use a wet paper towel to clean the bottom plate after each use. Would definitely recommend, wish I had found this sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I am super lazy when it comes to boiling eggs but with this gadget, I can be as lazy as possible! It is so easy to use and makes delicious hard-boiled and poached eggs in a few short minutes. I haven't used the omelette function yet but imagine that it is just as easy as anything else with this machine. You may need to adjust the water levels at first to match your egg-doneness preferences but I quickly learned how much water resulted in eggs cooked the way I like them. So quick and easy, breakfast is a snap. The little chime that goes off when your eggs are done is delightful. Definitely purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Have trouble with soft/hard boiled eggs?  Here's the answer.
customer_reviews.text: Pros-Love this product. Use it often. The handle (which I thought was overkill) works great to carry 6 hard boiled eggs from cooker directly to cold water. Makes peeling easy. Neg- (not serious) When the eggs are finished, there is a VERY loud buzzer that goes off. It scared me to death a few times. The stainless steel base can get a coating from water evaporation and heat. Easily cleans with a little Bar Keepers Friend.
customer_reviews.author: joycefl6

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic. It works great and I've never peeled a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. It works great and I've never peeled a boiled egg so easily! However, I have to remove 2 stars simply because the buzzer on this thing is terrifying. The first time it went off I thought it was my fire alarm. My dogs panicked and bolted to other rooms, hiding under my desks my bed. They seriously should have made the "complete" noise something way less dreadful. Would give 5 stars easily if they fix the buzzer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: just okay - boils them quickly
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. I like eggs boiled hard, this makes med hard, even with it set for the setting for hard. I also dislike that you have to poke holes in the bottom of the eggs before using. I will not use the omelette piece or the piece for scrambled eggs .They are very small, probably only 1 egg. I will not use this regularly. It will boil the eggs quickly. Anyway, I just prefer to biol them the old fashioned way. The eggs are also very hard to peel.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Makes hard boiling eggs a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Easy Peasy. Put in water, punch a hole on top of the egg, wait for the timer to ding, put the eggs in ice water, and you are done. Eggs usually peel easily. We have not used it for anything other than hard boiled, but don't see why it wouldn't work the same for any form of egg if you like something else.
customer_reviews.author: RagsToRags

customer_reviews.title: Works really well ............... but one concern
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described ............ except ............... mine turns on immediately after being plugged in. No need to push the "ON" button .............. is mine defective? Water leaves a slight stain when done and they apparently changed the "DONE" tone ........ mine is chiming and not obtrusive. One updated thought: Like most (I hope) our eggs are cold, from the fridge, when I start the process. I suggest leaving them in the cooker after it has been completed for a few more minutes before peeling them if you prefer hard-boiled. It really makes a difference in the yolks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away by how easy this egg cooker is to use. I use it to hard boil eggs, and they have turned out perfectly each time. I must have gotten a new unit because the sound it makes is a chime and it is not annoying. When people tell me how easy it is to hard boil eggs in a pan, I just shake my head. I don't have to wait for the water to boil, etc. I just use the sharp end to pierce the eggs and place them in the Dash cooker, add water and forget about them. When they are done, the timer chimes and then I remove the eggs and place them in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Joann 101

customer_reviews.title: New model jingles but doesn’t cook accurately.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black “buzzer style” and can confirm it’s a jovial jingle, not a fire alarm. However, following all instructions for a medium egg (puncture eggs, load bottom side up, fill to medium water line, let sit extra time for a firm medium as stated in the instruction booklet) and when I peeled it.. well... the whites weren't even set and it was a gloopy mess! While it may work after you finagle with water and time, the hassle of it not working accurately as instructed is a no go for me, so I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: osucristina

customer_reviews.title: Makes eggs easy to peel
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the easiest way to make hard boiled eggs! We have our own chickens and fresh eggs are really hard to peel, but using this egg cooker, they peel easily. The poached eggs are also cooked to perfection. I have not tried the omelet, but honestly would not use that that part anyway. I wouldn't want a steamed omelet. I have seen other reviews that complain about the sound indicating it is done. I don't think it is that bad, just really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Two

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I have tried too many times to count, to get a hard boiled egg or a poached egg. Following the directions for each, results in an undercooked egg. The boiled is very soft boiled with white still gooey. The poached egg is still runny on top when the timer goes off. I added more water and reset timer. Kept an eye on it. When the top looked done to my liking, the bottom was not completely done. Had to let it cook until yolk was like a boiled egg before the bottom was done. Not worth the money to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Hard boils eggs, and the shell comes off easy
customer_reviews.text: Hard boils eggs, and the shell comes off easily. I am so tired of peeling egg shells, and having half of the egg inside, end up in the sink. This egg boiler seems to work very well, and as it says...but do not care for the other attachments that came with it, like the omelet pan or egg poacher...was way too small for my use. It would take me too long to make breakfast if I used this set up, but the hard boiled egg part works nice, so I am happy! That is what I bought is for anyway.
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: Best. Boiled
customer_reviews.text: Best. Boiled. Eggs. OfYourLIFE. The scrambled/omelette and poached eggs are ok, but not anything spectacular. But the boiled eggs are amazing. If you are like me and either eat them on the go, or pack them as a snack, this little device is WORTH IT. If you don't eat eggs that much, or don't completely rush in the morning like me, then don't bother getting it. In the morning, I wake up, quickly get this thing cooking and turn on my coffee maker, by the time I am done in the bathroom this thing is buzzing and letting me know to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Easy eggs in a Dash
customer_reviews.text: I made the best poached eggs using the Dash egg cooker! And clean up was a breeze! I can't wait to try this on omelettes and hard boiled eggs! I've never been so excited about eggs in my life LOL Update: I tried the Dash egg cooker to make hard boiled eggs, they turned out perfect and were incredibly easy to peel. Considering I am the deviled egg maker at all family functions I loved being able to peel the eggs easily, without destroying them. I've also used it to make omelets, it's fantastic! The ease and perfection of making hard boiled eggs alone, even if you don't make poached eggs or omelets, makes this unit is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, handle broke and fell off when I opened the box
customer_reviews.text: I just received this egg cooker, and I was excited to use it. However, as soon as I opened it, the black plastic handle on the side of the dome snapped off while I opened the plastic. You can see where the handle broke off on one side in the picture I posted. Concerned about the durability of this product. I'm hoping I can return this and get a replacement or find a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Park

customer_reviews.title: Meal changer
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these on sale at Target a year or so ago and use it all the time for soft boiled eggs. I have to travel for some extended periods so we bought this one because we have become pretty dependent on it for certain things. I don't think there is a gadget we use more frequently for breakfast. We haven't tried steaming veggies or doing omelettes, but for soft boiled eggs it is a total solution. We're fans -- easy to clean, easy to store, easy to use. And it's simple enough that there's really nothing to break.
customer_reviews.author: DGB

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I have boiled eggs just about anywhere where power was but bear in mind when camping or trucking or simply on the road you will need a proper wattage to get it working,so you'll need a proper power converter like mine which is 3500 watts continuos power supply and 5000 watts peak,you may get away with less but I chose better have it and needed and unless you have vehicle already equiped with that kinda power you may want to contact seller to get some info. This info does NOT apply when gadges is used anywhere where 110 household jack is available.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay product. I don't really use it anymore because it's too unpredictable. You have to get the water exactly right. One millimeter too low and the eggs come out too soft (the length of cook time is relative to how much water you put in). You put in too much and it overcooks the eggs. They put in a line for visual aid but I find that makes the eggs really soft. In the end, it works, but for me it's more trouble than it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Bris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have used my Dash 6-egg cooker twice since I've received it and I love this machine. For me, I use it mainly to cook hard boiled eggs....but does do poached & scrambled. It's really easy to use- comes w/ clear, easy to follow instructions. A small amount of water steams the eggs. Comes w/ a small cup for water that has measured lines so you know how much water to use. It's small- doesn't take up much room. I really love this machine! :)
customer_reviews.author: emmielusion

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the other brand's button keeps breaking. I don't need to push any buttons on this device however it has this loud annoying ringing when the egg finishes cooking that will not stop until you unplug the device. The other brand just beeped a few times and then turned itself off. (easier) This one is also much hard to keep clean. It doesn't wash well. Even with a little vinegar for the metal part it still gets pretty gross within two uses. The plastic is pretty grimmy too. It is ok, but I miss the other brand. Except for the broken buttons.
customer_reviews.author: dromer04

customer_reviews.title: Buzzer is fire alarm loud
customer_reviews.text: This buzzer sounds like a fire drill. I have a room mate and I wake up a half an hour before him every morning and this scares the both of us. I'm not exaggerating at all. The eggs taste delicious afterwards. If I wasn't so desperate for one of these, and I knew the screeching sound it made, I would never buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: mark hakim

customer_reviews.title: This appliance is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love eggs. When I saw this deal on Amazon, I thought what do I have to loose? Well this small wonder is way better than I expected! It is smaller than I imagined, so it is very easy to store. It was very easy to use, Even for the initial time. It cooked the eggs to perfection, even the soft boiled eggs which I haven’t had in quite a while because of the hassle before using the Dash. The hard boiled eggs were cooked just right too, and peeled easily. I don’t review products this soon after trying them, but this little gem is for real. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Pasquale70

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it's supposed to do and is pretty decent for the price. Seems they have changed the loud noise that many have mentioned to a charming little chime. Only thing I would say is it takes too long to make a 2 egg omelet that's not runny. You have to cook it on the omelet setting twice and I turned it over between both cycles to get a fully cooked omelet. I don't think an omelet is worth all that time and effort. Would be better to just prepare your omelets on the stove as usual. The boiled eggs are great though so I say go for it if you like boiled or poached eggs.
customer_reviews.author: JJo

customer_reviews.title: Best little appliance I can't live without!
customer_reviews.text: I received one for Xmas and love it! Never knew how much I needed it til I had one! Takes the guessing out of poaching, soft or hard boiling eggs! They are PERFECT every time without standing over the pot and timing. I now eat more eggs than ever cause they're so easily cooked! And I have recommended this little Egg Miracle to 3 other friends and purchased this one for another friend and they all LOVE it as much as I do! The manufacturer should get together with an Egg company and promote these Perfect Egg Cookers and they would sell tons more! Thanks for making one small part of my day easier!
customer_reviews.author: A. Trant

customer_reviews.title: Love this little egg cooker
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is the best thing since sliced bread.....which I put my perfectly poached eggs on! It took a little time to figure out exactly how much water to put in it for that perfect egg. I finally got it. For me, it was a little above the poached line. I marked it with a sharpie for future use. I use this every single day. It's easy to clean and small enough to leave on the counter next to the coffee maker. I can't think of a single con. I've been using it for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: A little gem, but a little small
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this gadget earlier this week. Works great and even plays a happy electronic tune when the eggs are ready. We happen to have a chicken coop and our hens are mostly laying enormous eggs, double yolks etc. which are much larger than Grade A. We've found that we can't load a full rack of six of our hen's eggs into the machine as the dome is too small. Shouldn't be an issue for most folks that get their eggs from the grocery store. Please keep this issue in mind if you plan to cook colossal home-grown eggs in this cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Duckrancher

customer_reviews.title: What a great cooking tool!
customer_reviews.text: Geez, I wish they had made this forty years ago! This is phenomenal. I've used it about six times since I bought it near the end of August and I haven't had a single batch eggs fall apart as I removed the shells...yet. Seriously, if you make hard boiled eggs as often as I do (egg salad), then this is the best investment to hard boil eggs so that they peel easily. And I haven't had the whites come off once. This cooks them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Talker

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have ever purchased. Is smaller than it appears in picture, so takes up little counter space . I was admittedly skeptical, and tried as soon as it arrived. To my amazement, it worked beautifully, and I have used 3 times thus far -- perfectly hard boiled eggs, EASILY peeled -- a big plus for me as I have neuropathy in my hands. Love not having to drag out a pan, stand there while water comes to a boil, time boil, etc etc. You can leave the kitchen while using the DASH-- a very loud buzzer will let you know when eggs are ready. I will be giving this product as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Dash Rapid Egg Cooker basically to make hard boiled eggs. We make them frequently and we have tried several methods. We can never get them to peel well once cooked. This product is a GEM!!!! It cooks the eggs quickly with no mess and makes perfect hard boiled eggs that are VERY EASY TO PEEL!!! We are still experimenting with the timing for poached eggs. They came out too runny the first time. We have not yet tried them again. But even if we just use it for hard boiled eggs, we could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boiled eggs that peel quick every time!  No mess!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Quick, easy, no fuss and easy peeling eggs! No pots of boiling water, no running under cold water, no remembering if it was salt, vinegar, lemon juice or baking soda to add to the water to get the eggs to peel without botching them and a roll of paper towels later! EASY.. pop the eggs in the holder add the appropriate amount of water in provided measured container. Wait for the jingle. Some say it is too loud. I think it is just right. Perfect eggs that peel quickly everytime! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marylou E. Leach

customer_reviews.title: Changed the timer sound
customer_reviews.text: This product is super easy to use! Also, I was super worried about using it the first time based off reviews of people saying the alarm is really loud, but the company listened and changed it to a little jingle. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: DestinyD99

customer_reviews.title: It made me eggs, and didn't screech!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've just made hard and medium boiled eggs but its pretty straightforward and foolproof. We'll see how it holds up. Biggest news though was the alarm! They listened to y'all! No mas banshee!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a HORRIBLE product. Organic eggs are NOT cheap and I’ve wasted more than a few eggs with this. Through the tiny pinhole a good portion of the egg comes out of the shell while “cooking” so it’s wasteful there, and then I followed the instructions to the tee and the picture shows how a “hard boiled” egg comes out. I’m sending this back for a refund and I’ll just make my eggs the old fashioned way. Takes about the same amount of time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use is ridiculously good. I bought it for someone visually impaired and he loves how simple it is. It takes up less room than I thought. The footprint is smaller than the size of a salad plate. The only issue I have is with cleaning. It leaves a scaly residue at the bottom that I’m struggling to remove. It’s like dried salt. The cost and easy operation is worth figuring out a way to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: My Best Amazon Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've used this just about every day for three years, and can't recommend it highly enough. I use a little more water than the measuring cup states for hard boiled eggs just like I like them. The buzzer is very loud when the egg cooker is finished, so I wouldn't recommend this if you cook your eggs when someone is trying to sleep. To clean it, I use Bar Keeper's Friend on the metal cook surface and soak the plastic egg tray in some vinegar. This is one of those products that, if it ever did break, I'd immediately buy a replacement with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love eggs and I love cooking, but everyone gets lazy especially after a work out, I was able to cook an omelette (I even added milk) within the time it took me to shower after working out. It cooked perfectly and was a perfect portion for 2-3 eggs for one omelette. The hard boiled was perfect also, extremely easy and takes all the guess work and hot boiling water out of the picture. The egg poker didnt break the entire egg and worked better than I thought. Would Recommend this product to any egg lover
customer_reviews.author: Trever

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY! Never have hard-to-peel hardboiled eggs again!
customer_reviews.text: BEST. INVENTION. EVER. Especially for the price. Recommended on a podcast as a great gadget to solve the egg-cooking problem. Love hardboiled eggs, but the process is painful without this little wonder. With this gadget, it's super simple and uses a minimal amount of water. I cooked 4 1/2 dozen eggs in rapid succession and every time, they cooked and peeled perfectly. If you are a busy cook, frustrated by eggs that don't peel well after hard-boiling, no matter what you do - GET THIS NOW!! I can't say enough good things about it. Best $20 purchase EVER for the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Best hard boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: Easiest way to make hard boiled eggs I have ever used I have tried instapot I have tried on the stove I have tried several other little cooking machines and this one by far makes the best hard-boiled eggs I have ever had. It's so easy to use my 4-year-old can help me set it up and a little time will play until you come and press the button but it does stop cooking before then. it also has other features to make poached eggs and omelette eggs and soft and medium boiled eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gadget❣️
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Don’t know how I’ve done without it all these years. Loud buzzer when finished and you do have to turn that off. 12/13 min from start to finish on hard boiled extra large eggs. I have made omelets, soft boiled, hard boiled and poached eggs. Cleans up great. I wipe the hot plate down so I have no build up of iron from the water. Small learning curve on how you like your eggs cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Dana B

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been regularly using it since I bought is a couple of months back. It is easy to use, and boils the eggs just right. Only issue I have is cleaning the metal plate, I have used the water and vinegar mix suggested in the instruction book but that doesn't clean it completely, leaving behind some stains and I am just wondering if over time the whole plate will have those stains on it...
customer_reviews.author: K.Sally

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! Could be black magic but it makes me ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Could be black magic but it makes me so happy I'll allow it. Where has this been all my life? No more screaming obscenities and throwing eggs against the wall while having a temper tantrum because I couldn't get the shells off. This does exactly what it says it will do. The only thing I would change is the design to include storage for the small optional parts. Those are always annoying to find a place for in my kitchen. Other than that, it is perfection. I have already ordered another one for my daughter. THANK YOU in advance for the mountains of deviled eggs and egg salad to come.
customer_reviews.author: pollyester

customer_reviews.title: Consistantly perfect boiled eggs, despite low quality look and feel.
customer_reviews.text: This egg cooker is a good value. It produces perfect boiled eggs every time, something I struggle with (usually half the egg sticks to the shell). The measuring cup / egg piercer is a nice addition. It's also easy to clean. It has some little quality problems, such as the power button is so hard to push you have to hold on to the unit - which is a problem when it's still hot. And the alarm sound is very cheesy music that keeps going until you push the button. However, the little annoyances are easy to overlook at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Drooling poached eggs
customer_reviews.text: Was eager to try it out and decided to do poached eggs for my hash. The tool was easy to assemble and was nicely finished. When I went to put the required water into the measuring cup I found that the markings were almost impossible to read. I had to guess at the proper setting and must have been wrong because the egg whites on the two eggs were not fully cooked . I intend to paint the markings to make them readable. That might cure the problem.
customer_reviews.author: RBuck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent short cut for body building meal prep
customer_reviews.text: Perfect eggs. Just perfect. On my first use I did three hard boiled eggs as a test. I set my watch timer to 12 minutes (matches the estimate in the guide book), and the (extraordinarily irritating) alarm went off within moments of my alarm. If you immediately rinse the eggs in tap/cold water, it stops the cooking process and separates the inner egg shell membrane from the albumens. The shells came off so easy! Definitely great for hard boiled. Haven't tried the medium or soft boiled options, and I'm not particularly interested in the accompanying omelette trays. But this is going to make food prep for the week SO MUCH EASIER.
customer_reviews.author: DancerJack

customer_reviews.title: I now can eat hard boiled eggs.
customer_reviews.text: Being lazy and wanting a healthy breakfast is a bad combination but this is so easy to use and peel the eggs afterwards. Make sure you put the eggs in cool or ice water after they are done. That's how i do it and its great. My fiances just leaves them in the Dash rapid egg cooker to cool and i think it overcooks them. I don't know why she hates me so much.
customer_reviews.author: joel janke

customer_reviews.title: Updated timer alarm is quite pleasant
customer_reviews.text: First batch of hard boiled eggs came out perfect following the directions in the manual. After reading other reviews about the timer buzzer, I was pleasantly surprised with what must be an updated version...see my video with sound on, quite pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Frank T

customer_reviews.title: BEST WAY TO DO HARD BOILED EGGS
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this thing 5 stars but I don't want the seller to get a big head. This is one of the world's best kept secrets. If you want a simple, easy way to get perfect hard boiled eggs, this is it. Just follow the instructions and when the eggs are doing cooking, cool them off in ice water. It stops the cooking process cold (pardon the pun). Makes perfect hard boiled eggs every time. The poking of the hole on top of the egg does take a bit of practice. You'll ruin a few eggs getting the hang of it but that's life.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: another use that's not eggs
customer_reviews.text: Was great the first time out. Easy peasy. Perfect hard boiled. All I tried so far but I was really happy the alarm sound everyone hated is gone. I have found another use for this fantastic devise, White Castle frozen sliders. Two sliders fit perfectly atop the egg holder. Fill the water to "poached" put on the lid and you get steamed sliders, beautiful buns, just like at the restaurant. About the eggs: hard or soft perfect. The poached are almost as good but the convenience can not be beat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: I'm generally happy with an Amazon Recommendation...Except now!
customer_reviews.text: This was an Amazon Recommendation and judging by the 5 star reviews, I just couldn't go wrong. After the first use, I like medium done poached eggs. I followed the directions and measured the right amount of water. What i got when the timer went off was a nice poach but really much more runny than I prefer. The second use provided worse results. I put enough water for hard poached eggs. When the water was gone, the timer went off and the eggs were cooked on top but the underside was completely clear and runny. I'm reading the warranty next to see how to get my money back or exchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: If you love eggs this will only prepare boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for easy boiled eggs, well that is pretty much all this thing cooks well. Says it can cook omelets only if you like runny omelets with other items in it, I normally add stuff to the eggs or it is just called egg souffle. The poached egg feature either over cooks the yoke or leaves some uncooked egg behind under the egg after cooking. Other than all this the boiled egg feature is pretty much it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: Boiled eggs are easy now!!
customer_reviews.text: I know boiling eggs is suppose to be easy but to me, it’s a pain because I either forget about them, or undercook them. I love hard boiled eggs for my salads and finally bought this cute little thing! And absolutely love it! Quick and easy and foolproof. Sweet little bell sounding noise lets me know when they are finished cooking. Put the eggs in ice water when finished cooking. And peeling them is a breeze! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tlanden

customer_reviews.title: Reliable way to obtain easy to peel eggs
customer_reviews.text: Strange to read the borderline ridiculous comments regarding the end alarm.....REALLY? Trumps fault again for libtards who expect the government to produce their food product? Even used the poaching mode three times with good success. Forgot to pierce the shells once and still obtained very good results for either deviled eggs or ordinary hard boiled. Nice inexpensive product that does what is stated. eggs or ordinary hard boiled eggs.
customer_reviews.author: starrman

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I always had a terrible time boiling an egg then trying to peel it cleanly. With this little gadget all those problems went away. The only con is that I prefer very hard boiled eggs, no mush with in the yolk. With this gadget follow the directions and the once that awful finished beeping goes off to let you know they are done. Let them sit in the boiler. I let mine sit for at least 30 mins. And they are usually too hot to handle immediately after any way. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for quick eggs
customer_reviews.text: So I finally decided to get myself one of these. I am happy I finally did. I absolute love how quick this thing is, makes great medium hard eggs which I love. I haven't tried making an omelet yet but did try the pouched egg. The pouched egg came out great but it stuck to the tray. I'd recommend spraying it with a none stick oil spray. I don't really have anything bad to say about it since I'm super happy with it. If you make boiled eggs a lot, get yourself one of these. You won't regret it. Almost forgot to mention, it has a little ring when its all done cooking your eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Govea

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: If you make deviled eggs, egg salad, or just hard boiled eggs you NEED this in your life! I bought this after my sister in law told me about using one at her work and how well it worked and the ease of peeling the eggs. I was skeptical. But I figured for the price, I would try it. Amazing! It worked so well, I brought it to work and showed the girls I work with how well it worked and how easy the eggs peeled. Three of them went on Amazon and bought one that morning. This is worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to make perfect eggs in minutes, but at what horrible, noisy cost?
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing functionally. I was never good at making hard-boiled eggs easy to peel or to the desired level of oneness. This machine makes them perfectly every time, and the entire process takes about 5 minutes. But then it finishes cooking and the alarm bell goes off. This isn't a simple tone that dings 3 times before shutting off. It is a horrible cacophony of extremely loud high pitched vaguely musical noise. And it does not shut off until you physically go and press the power button. Honestly if they cut the volume on the alarm by about 65% and made the machine shut off automatically after a couple seconds This product would be 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: EGGS. I NEED EGGS!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves eggs so why not hard boil them and enjoy them as deviled or sliced in a salad or even with your pasta if you're Italian. Sliced up and in a sandwich.. yes yes yes!! Just great overall. You can even make an omelette. Great price. Cute company with their little appliances. Build is great. Where you put the water will discolor after first use but that is just a fact you can live with as it doesn't affect anything at all. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. It is smaller then I expected, but it is only for 6 eggs. It works absolutely perfect for boiled eggs. Ive had some issues with the poached eggs not being quite done, but that was easily fixed by using more water. I just wish it did more then 2 poached eggs at a time. Another review said something about the ring being more of a screech, but mine plays a pleasant little tune when it is done. For boiled eggs it doesnt get easier and more cost effective then this. I absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: danny grosshouser

product_meta.title: Dash black Rapid 6 Capacity Electric Cooker for Hard Boiled, Poached, Scrambled Eggs, or Omelets with Auto Shut Off Feature, One Size
feature_bullets: SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Dash Rapid Egg Cooker is the ORIGINAL (and most trusted) egg cooker on the market, for perfect eggs, your way, EVERY TIME, we guarantee it!

VERSATILE: This is the PERFECT appliance for picky eaters, large families, or those who have busy schedules. Hard boiled eggs, soft boiled eggs, poached eggs, scrambled eggs, individual omelets, and all within minutes of the push start button - it couldn’t be easier!

COMPACT + LIGHTWEIGHT: Weighing 1lb, the Dash Rapid Egg Cooker is your MUST-HAVE for that first apartment, smaller kitchen, college dorm life, or camper/RV traveling. Plus, its sleek design and trendy color options will accent any kitchen space (bonus all included accessories fit inside, taking up even LESS space). Boils up to 6 eggs at a time, poaches up to 2 eggs with its separate poaching tray or makes an omelet.Cord length: 33

INCLUDES: Dash Rapid Egg Cooker is backed by a 1-year manufacturer warranty and includes a poaching tray, omelet tray, 6 egg holder tray, measuring cup, recipe book and recipe database access (all non-electric parts are dishwasher safe)

QUICK + EASY: Short on time? Simply choose your preferred eggs and set the timer. The auto-shut off function prevents overcooking, and the buzzer will alert you when your eggs are ready. Its so simple, even your kids can use it. Power : 360 Watts.Material Plastic, Metal
